      void changeGrade​()
      changeGrade() modifies the attributes of a preexisting grade object preCondition: a grade already exists post condition: the grades values are modified
      java.lang.String checkGrade​(java.lang.String studentName, java.lang.String professor, java.lang.String course1)
      checkGrade() which returns the associated float value in grade objects precondition: assignment has grade post condition: returns the grade value (float) taken from the assignment
      void createGrade​()
      createGrade() creates a grade object precondition: a grade object does not exist postcondition: a grade object is created
      boolean pollStudents​()
      boolean pollStudents() checks if the student object exists/ is valid for the particular assignment/ grade precondition student tries to access grade post condition: returns data if true, returns error false
      void removeAssignment​()
      removeAssignment() removes an already existing assignment object from the relevant course and "sets" the visibility to false as long as there is no grade associated with the assignment precondition: an assignment without a grade exists postCondition: the assignment is removed from the array and visibility is set to false
